text:
Time & Money

Hi students; we have a client who wants us to help them build a useful model. One of the things people care about is time. For example, students care about the free time they have to do other things apart from school work. Such free time could be used to get a job to make money. Likewise, adults care about their time and money. In this task, you will have the opportunity to revise a model that Kenia developed to decide if it is worth moving to a different city to save money on house rent.
Recreate this initial model in your workspace

Looking at the model, you will realize that she did not consider the amount she would spend on gas or consider if the $350 is worth her time. You should also assess this model to know what else might be missing. Then, you should develop a more useful model for Kenia. Do not forget to discuss your model with another group to get feedback about your new model.
